text: decision: remove sql migration and artifacts
Store is CSV-only: memories.csv, links.csv, handoffs.csv
Dropped SQL migration paths to keep startup predictable and avoid hidden reimports
Memory IDs are random base36 like cr-8n2y; handoff IDs are hf-xxxx
IDs are non-sequential; ordering comes from ts_utc, not identifier
cr handoff defaults to open latest checkpoint; mark is explicit
handoff mark blocks if no new memories since previous checkpoint
First handoff scope is bounded by --window when enough history exists
handoff open prints instructions plus checkpoint slice newest->oldest
next: spin up a fresh agent and run cr handoff open --limit 20
CLI uses clap for argument parsing
clap provides type-safe CLI with great help messages
Memory limit is 100 chars to keep things atomic
Short memories are easier for agents to scan and understand
